1.12.2.1.12.2-1.6.3.2:
Added a configuration option to allow all entities to cause portal generation upon teleportation through a portal.
Disabling colored portals now fully disables all dyeing behavior.
Improved the teleportation logic.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.6.3.1: Fixed a crash related to advancements.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.6.3.0:
Fixed instant portal teleportation in survival mode.
Invalid corner frame blocks are no longer cloned.
Fixed a teleportation crash.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.6.2.0:
Fixed invalid dimension IDs causing the game to crash.
The portal search radius and portal generation location search radius are now configurable.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.6.0.0:
Invalid portal type JSONs are no longer deleted.
Fixed a teleportation crash.
/rporeload and /rporeloadclient now list the loaded portal type groups.
Single portal blocks can now be dyed by right clicking on them.
Zombie pigman spawn rates are now configurable for each portal type.
Improved the advancements. Advancements can now be disabled in the configuration.
Portals now contribute to beacon colors and have map colors.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.5.0.0:
Revamped the portal configuration system and teleportation logic. There are now many more options to configure, however, custom portal types created prior to this version are not compatible.
RandomPortals no longer requires RandomPatches Integration.
Added advancements for activating a lateral Nether portal over 100 blocks large and dyeing a Nether portal red.
Many bug fixes and improvements.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.4.0.0:
Added more portal events.
Renamed "nether_portal_types" to "portal_types". Any preexisting portal types will be migrated to the new directory.
Miscellaneous improvements.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.2.0.0:
Improved custom Nether portal types and activators.
Bug fixes and improvements.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.1.0.0:
Improved the colored portal textures.
Improved the portal rendering logic.
Multiple colors can now be defined for Nether portal types.
Activators can now be defined for Nether portal types.
Miscellaneous bug fixes and improvements.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.0.0:
Added colored portals. Portals are now dyeable.
When portals are activated, user placed portal blocks are no longer replaced, which makes it easier to create colored patterns.
Villagers now sometimes spawn with vertical End portal frames on their head.
Teleportation delays can now be specified for custom Nether portal types.
Removed the global Nether portal size JSONs and the all_variants size JSONs.
Bug fixes and improvements.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.9.0.0:
Receiving Nether portals are now persistent, making NetherPortalFix and similar mods obsolete. It should be noted that receiving portals will reset if they do not have a valid frame or are of a different type, and will not remain persistent if the sending portal was activated before this version of RandomPortals was installed.
Bug fixes and improvements.
Any custom Nether portals in preexisting worlds will revert to vanilla Nether portal behavior.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.7.0.0:
RandomPortals now requires RandomPatches Integration.
Bug fixes and improvements.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.6.0.0:
Renamed the mod to RandomPortals.
Bug fixes and improvements.
Any vertical and upside down End portals in preexisting worlds will have to be reactivated for them to render properly.
Any custom Nether portals in preexisting worlds will revert to vanilla Nether portal behavior.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.5.0.0:
Added the "type" and "canBeActivatedByFire" properties to Nether portal types.
Bug fixes and improvements.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.4.0.0:
Required corners are now configurable for Nether portal types.
Generated portal frame dropping can now be disabled for Nether portal types.
Bug fixes and improvements.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.3.0.0:
Improved Nether portal types. Ore dictionary names and meta values can now be specified.
Bug fixes and improvements.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.2.0.0:
Implemented Nether portal types.
Bug fixes and improvements.
